name: Unscrew the new Fandom Minecraft wiki
description:
They really screwed up this time. This removes the sidebar, banner ads, all the images at the bottom of the page, the floating header, and it also makes the page wider.

Tested using Stylus. NOT tested on Stylish or any other userstyles tool.
